${modID}:Material.NAME: Material
${modID}:Material.DESCRIPTION: A resource used by other cards and buildings. NL Unplayable
${modID}:Material.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 2 ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SubmachineGun.NAME: Submachine Gun
${modID}:SubmachineGun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 1 from ${modID}:Stock: Deal !${modID}:BONUS! damage.
${modID}:SubmachineGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 1 from ${modID}:Stock: Deal !${modID}:BONUS! damage.

${modID}:Miner.NAME: Build Miner
${modID}:Miner.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Miner. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:Miner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Miner. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand.

${modID}:Turret.NAME: Build Turret
${modID}:Turret.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL Add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:Turret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL Add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand.

${modID}:RainingBullets.NAME: Raining Bullets
${modID}:RainingBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Up to 2 times: NL ${modID}:Consume 1: NL ${modID}:Fire all ${modID}:Turrets.
${modID}:RainingBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Up to 3 times: NL ${modID}:Consume 1: NL ${modID}:Fire all ${modID}:Turrets.

${modID}:SteamBattery.NAME: Steam Battery
${modID}:SteamBattery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! [E].
${modID}:SteamBattery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! [E].

${modID}:ManualLabor.NAME: Manual Labor
${modID}:ManualLabor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:ManualLabor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand.

${modID}:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
${modID}:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Up to 3 times: ${modID}:Consume 1: NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.
${modID}:Flamethrower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Up to 3 times: ${modID}:Consume 1 from ${modID}:Stock: NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:PiercingRounds.NAME: Piercing Rounds
${modID}:PiercingRounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 1: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
${modID}:PiercingRounds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 1: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Shotgun.NAME: Shotgun
${modID}:Shotgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:MAT!: NL Apply !M! Weak.
${modID}:Shotgun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:MAT!: NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:RepairSystem.NAME: Repair System
${modID}:RepairSystem.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you ${modID}:consumed 3 or more this turn, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:RepairSystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you ${modID}:consumed 3 or more this turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:HeavyArmour.NAME: Heavy Armour
${modID}:HeavyArmour.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Consume 2: NL Gain 3 Plated Armor.
${modID}:HeavyArmour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Consume 2: NL Gain 3 Plated Armor.

${modID}:YellowBelt.NAME: Yellow Belt
${modID}:YellowBelt.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !${modID}:BONUS! ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:YellowBelt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add !${modID}:BONUS! ${modID}:Material to your hand.

${modID}:RedBelt.NAME: Red Belt
${modID}:RedBelt.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL in ${modID}:Stock: NL Add 1 more ${modID}:Material to your hand than you consumed.
${modID}:RedBelt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL in ${modID}:Stock: NL Add 1 more ${modID}:Material to your hand than you consumed.

${modID}:YellowInserter.NAME: Yellow Inserter
${modID}:YellowInserter.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Add !${modID}:MAT! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Next turn, draw !M! card and add !${modID}:MAT! ${modID}:Material.
${modID}:YellowInserter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Add !${modID}:MAT! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Next turn, draw !M! card and add !${modID}:MAT! ${modID}:Material.

${modID}:Deconstruction.NAME: Deconstruction
${modID}:Deconstruction.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot.
${modID}:Deconstruction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb twice. NL Gain 1 Orb Slot.

${modID}:RocketBarrage.NAME: Rocket Barrage
${modID}:RocketBarrage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL in ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies per consumed. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RocketBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL in ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies per consumed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TargetPractice.NAME: Target Practice
${modID}:TargetPractice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 1 from ${modID}:Stock: NL ${modID}:Fire all ${modID}:Turrets.

${modID}:Blueprint.NAME: Blueprint
${modID}:Blueprint.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine. NL Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL Channel ${modID}:Miner. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PoisonCapsule.NAME: Poison Capsule
${modID}:PoisonCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine. NL ${modID}:Consume 1: This turn, ${modID}:Land_Mines apply !M! Poison.
${modID}:PoisonCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine. NL ${modID}:Consume 1: This turn, ${modID}:Land_Mines apply !M! Poison.

${modID}:SlowCapsule.NAME: Slowdown Capsule
${modID}:SlowCapsule.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: This turn, ${modID}:Land_Mines apply !${modID}:VULN! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.
${modID}:SlowCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: This turn, ${modID}:Land_Mines apply !${modID}:VULN! Vulnerable and !M! Weak.

${modID}:RedScience.NAME: Automation Science
${modID}:RedScience.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:RedScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Innate.

${modID}:LogisticRobot.NAME: Logistic Robot
${modID}:LogisticRobot.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Put !${modID}:DRAW! cards from your draw pile into your hand.
${modID}:LogisticRobot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Put !${modID}:DRAW! cards from your draw pile into your hand.>

${modID}:HeavyArtillery.NAME: Heavy Artillery
${modID}:HeavyArtillery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Up to !M! times: ${modID}:Consume 3 from ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !${modID}:SPLASH! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:HeavyArtillery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Up to !M! times: ${modID}:Consume 3 from ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !${modID}:SPLASH! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Locomotive.NAME: Locomotive
${modID}:Locomotive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Replay each Wagon you played this combat. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Locomotive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Replay each Wagon you played this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CargoWagon.NAME: Cargo Wagon
${modID}:CargoWagon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !${modID}:HAND! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Add !${modID}:DISC! ${modID}:Material to your discard pile.
${modID}:CargoWagon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !${modID}:HAND! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Add !${modID}:DISC! ${modID}:Material to your discard pile.

${modID}:ArtilleryWagon.NAME: Artillery Wagon
${modID}:ArtilleryWagon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:COST! from ${modID}:Stock: Deal !${modID}:AOE! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:ArtilleryWagon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:COST! from ${modID}:Stock: Deal !${modID}:AOE! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChainSignal.NAME: Chain Signal
${modID}:ChainSignal.DESCRIPTION: The next Wagon you play is played twice. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ChainSignal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next 2 Wagons you play are played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RailSignal.NAME: Rail Signal
${modID}:RailSignal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you played a Wagon this turn, gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.
${modID}:RailSignal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you played a Wagon this turn, gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.

${modID}:ScienceWagon.NAME: Science Wagon
${modID}:ScienceWagon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!  Block. NL Add !M! random Science card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScienceWagon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B!  Block. NL Add !M! random Science cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Derailment.NAME: Derailment
${modID}:Derailment.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a Cliff to your discard pile.
${modID}:Derailment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a Cliff to your discard pile.

${modID}:FluidWagon.NAME: Fluid Wagon
${modID}:FluidWagon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Block for each ${modID}:Material in ${modID}:Stock.
${modID}:FluidWagon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Block for each ${modID}:Material in ${modID}:Stock.

${modID}:LightArmour.NAME: Light Armour
${modID}:LightArmour.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you ${modID}:Consumed this turn, gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.
${modID}:LightArmour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you ${modID}:Consumed this turn, gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.

${modID}:BudgetDefenses.NAME: Budget Defenses
${modID}:BudgetDefenses.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !${modID}:DRAW! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:BudgetDefenses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !${modID}:DRAW! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ExpansionPolicy.NAME: Expansion Policy
${modID}:ExpansionPolicy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For each enemy damaged, add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand.
${modID}:ExpansionPolicy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL For each enemy damaged, add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand.

${modID}:RapidDeployment.NAME: Rapid Deployment
${modID}:RapidDeployment.DESCRIPTION: Channel X ${modID}:Turrets. NL ${modID}:Turrets do not ${modID}:consume ${modID}:Material this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RapidDeployment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel X+!M! ${modID}:Turrets. NL ${modID}:Turrets do not ${modID}:consume ${modID}:Material this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenScience.NAME: Logistics Science
${modID}:GreenScience.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL draw !M! card that isn't ${modID}:Material.
${modID}:GreenScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, NL draw !M! cards that aren't ${modID}:Material.

${modID}:PurpleScience.NAME: Production Science
${modID}:PurpleScience.DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Consume each turn, behaves as if you had !M! extra ${modID}:Material in your hand.
${modID}:PurpleScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first ${modID}:Consume each turn, behaves as if you had !M! extra ${modID}:Material in your hand.

${modID}:SteamEngine.NAME: Steam Engine
${modID}:SteamEngine.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:CONS!: NL Gain !M! [E]. Exhaust.
${modID}:SteamEngine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:CONS! from ${modID}:Stock: NL Gain !M! [E]. Exhaust.

${modID}:SuppressiveFire.NAME: Suppressive Fire
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Turret fires, NL gain !M! Block.
${modID}:SuppressiveFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Turret fires, NL gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Railgun.NAME: Railgun
${modID}:Railgun.DESCRIPTION: Spend ALL Current ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>. NL Deal 3 times Charge spent damage.
${modID}:Railgun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend ALL Current ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>. NL Deal 3 times Charge spent damage.

${modID}:ReactiveArmour.NAME: Reactive Armour
${modID}:ReactiveArmour.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, whenever you take unblocked damage, NL Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine.
${modID}:ReactiveArmour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, whenever you take unblocked damage, NL Channel ${modID}:Land_Mine.

${modID}:Recycler.NAME: Recycler
${modID}:Recycler.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Add ${modID}:Material to your hand equal to its cost.
${modID}:Recycler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Add ${modID}:Material to your hand equal to its cost.

${modID}:EnergyShield.NAME: Energy Shield
${modID}:EnergyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.
${modID}:EnergyShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !${modID}:BONUS! Block.

${modID}:PersonalBattery.NAME: Personal Battery
${modID}:PersonalBattery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] next turn. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !M! [E].
${modID}:PersonalBattery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] next turn. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !M! [E].

${modID}:DischargeDefense.NAME: Discharge Defense
${modID}:DischargeDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Deal damage equal to your current Block.
${modID}:DischargeDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Deal damage equal to your current Block.

${modID}:PersonalLaser.NAME: Personal Laser
${modID}:PersonalLaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Deal !D! damage 2 times.
${modID}:PersonalLaser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Deal !D! damage 2 times.

${modID}:StorageChest.NAME: Storage Chest
${modID}:StorageChest.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, NL choose up to !M! cards to retain in your hand.
${modID}:StorageChest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, NL choose up to !M! cards to retain in your hand.

${modID}:CombatStim.NAME: Combat Stim
${modID}:CombatStim.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL The target gains !M! Strength.
${modID}:CombatStim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL The target gains !M! Strength.

${modID}:Exoskeleton.NAME: Exoskeleton
${modID}:Exoskeleton.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:Exoskeleton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL Gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:LaserTurret.NAME: Laser Turret
${modID}:LaserTurret.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL ${modID}:Turrets do not ${modID}:consume ${modID}:Material this turn.
${modID}:LaserTurret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: NL ${modID}:Turrets do not ${modID}:consume ${modID}:Material this turn.

${modID}:FlameTurret.NAME: Flame Turret
${modID}:FlameTurret.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL This turn, whenever a ${modID}:Turret fires, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:FlameTurret.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel ${modID}:Turret. NL This turn, whenever a ${modID}:Turret fires, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Roboport.NAME: Roboport
${modID}:Roboport.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, before drawing, NL Scry !M!.
${modID}:Roboport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, before drawing, NL Scry !M!.

${modID}:Refinery.NAME: Refinery
${modID}:Refinery.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL: NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your discard pile per ${modID}:consumed.
${modID}:Refinery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume ALL: NL Add !M! ${modID}:Material to your discard pile per ${modID}:consumed.

${modID}:Tank.NAME: Tank
${modID}:Tank.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Up to 4 times: NL ${modID}:Consume 2 from ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:Tank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Up to 4 times: NL ${modID}:Consume 2 from ${modID}:Stock: NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:NuclearWarhead.NAME: Nuclear Warhead
${modID}:NuclearWarhead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 6 from ${modID}:Stock: increase that damage by !${modID}:BONUS!.
${modID}:NuclearWarhead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Consume 6 from ${modID}:Stock: increase that damage by !${modID}:BONUS!.

${modID}:Assembler.NAME: Assembler
${modID}:Assembler.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:CONSUME!: NL Choose !M! of !${modID}:POOL! random Engineer cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
${modID}:Assembler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Consume !${modID}:CONSUME!: NL Choose !M! of !${modID}:POOL! random Engineer cards to add to your hand. They costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:Fish.NAME: Fish
${modID}:Fish.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL ${modID}:Consume 2: NL Heal !${modID}:B_HEAL! HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Fish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL ${modID}:Consume 2: NL Heal !${modID}:B_HEAL! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EconomyBoom.NAME: Economy Boom
${modID}:EconomyBoom.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! ${modID}:Miner.
${modID}:EconomyBoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel !M! ${modID}:Miner. NL Channel ${modID}:Miner.

${modID}:SteelAxe.NAME: Steel Axe
${modID}:SteelAxe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills, Channel ${modID}:Miner.
${modID}:SteelAxe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it kills, Channel ${modID}:Miner.

${modID}:TemporarySolution.NAME: Temporary Solution
${modID}:TemporarySolution.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [E]. NL Add 2 ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Add 2 Cliffs into your discard pile.
${modID}:TemporarySolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [E]. Add 3 ${modID}:Material to your hand. NL Add 2 Cliffs into your discard pile.

${modID}:Laboratory.NAME: Laboratory
${modID}:Laboratory.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: Add 1 random Science card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
${modID}:Laboratory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Charge <CHARGE>: Add 1 random Science card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:Scrap.NAME: Scrap
${modID}:Scrap.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block. NL Add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand for every !M! Block you lost.
${modID}:Scrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all Block. NL Add 1 ${modID}:Material to your hand for every !M! Block you lost.

${modID}:NuclearReactor.NAME: Nuclear Reactor
${modID}:NuclearReactor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Consume !M! from ${modID}:Stock: Permanently increase this card's Energy gain and Consume by 1.
${modID}:NuclearReactor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Consume !M! from ${modID}:Stock: Permanently increase this card's Energy gain and Consume by 1.

${modID}:ExpandedPockets.NAME: Expanded Pockets
${modID}:ExpandedPockets.DESCRIPTION: Increase your maximum hand size by !M! this combat.
${modID}:ExpandedPockets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase your maximum hand size by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Beacon.NAME: Beacon
${modID}:Beacon.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${modID}Consume !${modID}:COST! from ${modID}:Stock: Gain 1 Focus. Otherwise, lose 1 Focus.
${modID}:Beacon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, ${modID}Consume !${modID}:COST! from ${modID}:Stock: Gain 1 Focus. Otherwise, lose 1 Focus.
